original_text: Joab saw that there were battle lines in front of him and behind him; so he selected some of the best troops in Israel and deployed them against the Arameans.
korean_text: 요압이 자기와 맞서 앞뒤에 친 적진을 보고 이스라엘의 선발한 자 중에서 또 엄선하여 아람 사람과 싸우려고 진 치고

sentences.original_text: Joab saw that there were battle lines
in front of him and behind him
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 앞과 뒤에 있는 것을 보고
